questions.question: 1. What is the relationship between head and flow rate in a centrifugal pump?

answers.a: Head increases proportionally with flow rate
answers.b: Head decreases proportionally with flow rate
answers.c: Head increases with the square of the flow rate
answers.d: Head decreases with the square of the flow rate

questions.question: 2. Which of the following is a typical characteristic of a centrifugal pump's performance curve?

answers.a: Efficiency increases linearly with flow rate
answers.b: Power consumption decreases with increasing flow rate
answers.c: Head decreases with increasing flow rate
answers.d: Flow rate is independent of speed

questions.question: 3. What is the term for the minimum pressure at the pump inlet that prevents cavitation?
4. How does increasing the impeller diameter affect the pump's performance?

answers.c: Increases head but decreases flow rate
answers.d: Decreases head but increases flow rate

questions.question: 5. What is the best way to control the flow rate of a centrifugal pump?

answers.d: By adding more fluid to the system
